price: 15. Wonna hinnay diggah, usun (koros kinnuk) woo ayro (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) sinni Rabbik rebsimaanaah kaa mayablan.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
